fields.name: clearMask
fields.description: Mask for configuration to clear. Clear all saved configuration from the selected non-volatile memory if any bit is set.

fields.name: saveMask
fields.description: Mask for configuration to save. Save all current configuration to the selected non-volatile memory if any bit is set.

fields.name: loadMask
fields.description: Mask for configuration to load. Discard current configuration and rebuilt it from lower non-volatile memory layers if any bit is set.

fields.name: deviceMask
fields.description: Mask which selects the memory devices for saving and/or clearing operation. Bit 0 (U:1): devBBR (Battery-backed RAM). Bit 1 (U:1): devFlash (Flash). Bit 2 (U:1): devEEPROM (EEPROM, only supported for protocol versions less than 14.00). Bit 4 (U:1): devSpiFlash (SPI Flash, only supported for protocol versions less than 14.00). Note: If deviceMask is not provided (message length 12 bytes), the receiver defaults the operation requested to battery-backed RAM (BBR) and Flash (if available).
